name: A Farm Barn Fruits and Veggie Harvest - Match and Pop Mania
name_original: A Farm Barn Fruits and Veggie Harvest - Match and Pop Mania
description:
WARNING! This game is extemely addictive! Take a backseat and relax as you have a blast playing Funny Farm!

This new addictive game is gonna take your puzzle experience up a notch! With many awesome game features and cool background, you'll end up addicted and longing for more! This game allows you to choose cool background on your gameplay. Add up those power ups to make the game more exciting! Complete all levels and get the highest score!

Discover a new gaming experience with Funny Farm Blast! Download the game now!

How to Play:
> Make a vertical or horizontal line with 3 matching animals
> Tap and switch to match
> Complete all levels and get the highest score

Game Features:
> Choose your background
> Get your power ups
> Play in Timed or Endless mode
